column5: Wow! I am glad I didn't post the pic of the other hold I had it in. Got to keep it PG on the forum.
Nice catch Hulk.  Were you chillen with Macho? If so please tell Mrs Elizabeth I say hi.
she died of an over dose in 03 at lex lugers house..
I gave him the pile driver!
shoulda gone with the classic hogan leg drop off the top ropes.
I asked the crowd what they wanted and pile driver it was.  Maybe next time.
always the crowd pleaser

There are so many sucker species to keep track of, but that is a hog for sure! Here is one of mine from earlier this spring caught while Steelheading, was a blast to get on the Centerpin! Weighed in at 9 lbs! I think this one is a type of Redhorse or sumthing...my PB from the sucker family was nearly 12lbs caught when i was about 12 lol!
Nice catch Cudz.  For a minute there, I thought you where trying to disguise your self so your students didn't recognize you this summer..
that is one big sucker
could  that be on of those product that u get when carp and sucker are mixed..?
what did cudz ever do to you?
nope its a golden redhorse sucker newboy
Congrates on the "unofficial" record sucker...I mean sucker record. That sweet stash takes the cake Cudz!
It is probably a redhorse.  If that is the case, it is not close to the record.  Either way, it is the biggest sucker I have ever caught.
replace that smallie pic in your avatar with the sucker.. see how many people notice LOL!

I was out fishing for crappie when I hooked into this brute.  I don't know much about these but I know it is a sucker and I have to assume it is a white sucker.  It put up a real strong fight.  At first I thought it was a carp but when i brought it in I realized it was not.  Anyway, I measured it and it was 23" long and it weighed 5.64 pounds.  The current record for white sucker is 5.39 pounds.  That is totally irrelevant because a) I didn't kill it so it was not weighed on an official scale and  I don't really care to be an owner of a sucker record. lol. On a side note the fish crapped all over my newly made bow deck that I had not covered yet. It was almost the size of a goose crap.  I had to clean it up with a rag and iIpuked in my mouth a little bit.  Maybe you guys can correct me if I am wrong but I think it is a white sucker.  I can tell you one thing, they are stonger fighters than I thought they were.  length  feces on deck  weight
Its now officially the "Poop" deck.  Nice catch  You will now always be the unofficial Ontario Sucker Record holder in my books bud   Cheers  Craig
Man thats awesome
LOL, nice poo shot
thats a bigass sucker tho dam
too bad you didn't weigh it pre-poop
Oh by the way, it was a boys' weekend with a dirty moustache theme.  Thought I would pay tribute to the Hulkster.  LOL
ROTFLMAO!!!!!!!!
Whatcha gonna do when the white & gold sucka try and poo on you?!?!?!?!?
Riverfisher hit that one out of the park!!! I couldn't even see the fish at first man! LMAO!!!! Congrats on tha Sucka record!
That thing would look really good on a quick strike rig in December!

You scared the Crap out of it with that stache! We have the dirty stache themes too.  I may steal that for our next one!  Didi you actually bleach it? awesome.  As yes, I think it is a white sucker.  I have NEVER seen one that big though!  You can't trust those princess auto tape measures, record null and void!
That is a dandy. I think it's a redhorse.
white sukas, stained porn stashe, way tmi!  That thing would look really good on a quick strike rig in December! Ya and not on an ultra light!  Congrats on the catch? seemed kind of crappy to me!
Dude it's crapping out crap in the first pic when you're holding it up, I think you gave it the o'le stroombatz, lol I made up that word. Maybe it was sea sick?
The moustache, right?

i catch tons of those every spring during the rainbow run in the nottawasaga. even bigger than that lol. i think i've caught maybe 5 record fish an outing id still never report it lol. the world record is 9 lbs 3oz..  just hit the notty and you'll pull in a record every cast lol.
I've never seen a sucker anywhere near that large.. nice catch dude!
You guys are killing me...
Looks like a Redhorse to me!
Nice one BROTHAAAA
That's one big sucka!!!  Great going  Joey
....isn't anyone gonna complain about the vertical hold????
ohh yeah.. i forgot..  your a bad man for holding that sucker vertical! bad man!
